page.title: 13BELMONT YOUTH CLUB
page.content: Belmont{Youth Club}starts at 7.00.p.m. every Monday.It is held in the school hall and is a place of{recreation}for the young people of the village.It began in 1976.There are three leaders and 37 members.Membership enrolments are held each year.It has a pool table and a snooker table.The main {attraction}is the record player.The music varies every night.The atari T.V. game is very popular.There is a dart board which is used in the cloak room.At 8.00.p.m.{activities}stop while members watch "Adrian Mole"on television.There are sweets and pop on sale.There have been seven trips which have included the theatre, ski-ing, skating,swimming and a visit to "Camelot" near Chorley.
